summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6139 for the improvement of Windermere Road from Sand Point Way to approximately 600 feet and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85437, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
